c\u1ee7a b\u00e1c s\u0129 c\u1ea7n h\u1ee7y x\u00e1c minh"}},"verifyDoctor(address)":{"details":"X\u00e1c minh v\u00e0 cho ph\u00e9p m\u1ed9t b\u00e1c s\u0129 tham gia v\u00e0o h\u1ec7 x\u00e1c minh t\u00ednh to\u00e0n v\u1eb9n v\u00e0 s\u1ef1 t\u1ed3n t\u1ea1i.","params":{"_hash":"Hash c\u1ee7a h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 c\u1ea7n ki\u1ec3m tra."},"returns":{"_0":"bool Tr\u1ea3 v\u1ec1 true n\u1ebfu Hash \u0111\u00e3 t\u1ed3n t\u1ea1i tr\u00ean chu\u1ed7i."}}},"stateVariables":{"isVerifiedDoctor":{"details":"\u00c1nh x\u1ea1 \u0111\u1ecba ch\u1ec9 v\u00ed c\u1ee7a b\u00e1c s\u0129 v\u1edbi tr\u1ea1ng th\u00e1i x\u00e1c th\u1ef1c c\u1ee7a h\u1ecd true: \u0110\u00e3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u00e1c minh v\u00e0 c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 tham gia h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng false: Ch\u01b0a \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u00e1c minh ho\u1eb7c \u0111\u00e3 b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y x\u00e1c minh"}},"title":"EHR_Certify - H\u1ee3p \u0111\u1ed3ng ch\u1ee9ng th\u1ef1c ","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"EmergencyAccess(bytes32,address,uint256)":{"notice":"S\u1ef1 ki\u1ec7n n\u00e0y gi\u00fap: - Ghi l\u1ea1i m\u1ecdi l\u1ea7n truy c\u1eadp kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p - Th\u00f4ng b\u00e1o cho ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 - T\u1ea1o d\u1ea5u v\u1ebft ki\u1ec3m to\u00e1n cho m\u1ee5c \u0111\u00edch theo d\u00f5i"}},"kind":"user","methods":{"emergencyAccess(bytes32)":{"notice":"Ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng n\u00e0y \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng trong c\u00e1c tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p: - C\u1ea5p c\u1ee9u y t\u1ebf kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p - B\u1ec7nh nh\u00e2n b\u1ea5t t\u1ec9nh ho\u1eb7c kh\u00f4ng th\u1ec3 t\u1ef1 c\u1ea5p quy\u1ec1n - T\u00ecnh hu\u1ed1ng nguy c\u1ea5p c\u1ea7n xem th\u00f4ng tin y t\u1ebf ngay l\u1eadp t\u1ee9c - B\u1ec7nh nh\u00e2n ch\u01b0a k\u1ecbp c\u1ea5p quy\u1ec1n nh\u01b0ng c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u0111i\u1ec1u tr\u1ecb g\u1ea5p\u0110\u1ec3 \u0111\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o t\u00ednh minh b\u1ea1ch v\u00e0 tr\u00e1ch nhi\u1ec7m: - Ch\u1ec9 b\u00e1c s\u0129 \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u00e1c minh m\u1edbi c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng - M\u1ecdi l\u1ea7n truy c\u1eadp kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ghi l\u1ea1i - Ch\u1ee7 s\u1edf h\u1eefu h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 s\u1ebd \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u00f4ng b\u00e1o - B\u00e1c s\u0129 ph\u1ea3i ch\u1ecbu tr\u00e1ch nhi\u1ec7m v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng n\u00e0y"},"isVerifiedDoctor(address)":{"notice":"L\u01b0u tr\u1eef danh s\u00e1ch b\u00e1c s\u0129 \u0111\u00e3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u00e1c minh v\u00e0 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ph\u00e9p tham gia h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng"},"unverifyDoctor(address)":{"notice":"Ch\u1ec9 qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb vi\u00ean (owner) m\u1edbi c\u00f3 quy\u1ec1n h\u1ee7y x\u00e1c minh b\u00e1c s\u0129. Vi\u1ec7c h\u1ee7y x\u00e1c minh c\u00f3 th\u1ec3 \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c th\u1ef1c hi\u1ec7n trong c\u00e1c tr\u01b0\u1eddng h\u1ee3p: - B\u00e1c s\u0129 vi ph\u1ea1m quy \u0111\u1ecbnh c\u1ee7a h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng - Gi\u1ea5y ph\u00e9p h\u00e0nh ngh\u1ec1 h\u1ebft h\u1ea1n ho\u1eb7c b\u1ecb thu h\u1ed3i - B\u00e1c s\u0129 t\u1ef1 nguy\u1ec7n r\u1eddi kh\u1ecfi h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng Sau khi b\u1ecb h\u1ee7y x\u00e1c minh, b\u00e1c s\u0129 s\u1ebd: - Kh\u00f4ng th\u1ec3 s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng truy c\u1eadp kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p - C\u00e1c quy\u1ec1n truy c\u1eadp hi\u1ec7n c\u00f3 v\u1eabn gi\u1eef nguy\u00ean (c\u1ea7n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c thu h\u1ed3i ri\u00eang n\u1ebfu mu\u1ed1n)"},"verifyDoctor(address)":{"notice":"Ch\u1ec9 qu\u1ea3n tr\u1ecb vi\u00ean (owner) m\u1edbi c\u00f3 quy\u1ec1n x\u00e1c minh b\u00e1c s\u0129.  Quy tr\u00ecnh x\u00e1c minh b\u00e1c s\u0129 bao g\u1ed3m: 1. Ki\u1ec3m tra gi\u1ea5y ph\u00e9p h\u00e0nh ngh\u1ec1 y 2. X\u00e1c minh danh t\u00ednh v\u00e0 chuy\u00ean m\u00f4n 3. C\u1ea5p quy\u1ec1n tham gia h\u1ec7 th\u1ed1ng Sau khi \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c x\u00e1c minh, b\u00e1c s\u0129 c\u00f3 th\u1ec3: - \u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c b\u1ec7nh nh\u00e2n c\u1ea5p quy\u1ec1n xem h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 - S\u1eed d\u1ee5ng ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng truy c\u1eadp kh\u1ea9n c\u1ea5p khi c\u1ea7n"}},"notice":"\u0110\u01b0\u1ee3c s\u1eed d\u1ee5ng \u0111\u1ec3: - L\u01b0u tr\u1eef b\u1eb1ng ch\u1ee9ng v\u1ec1 s\u1ef1 t\u1ed3n t\u1ea1i c\u1ee7a h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 tr\u00ean blockchain - Qu\u1ea3n l\u00fd quy\u1ec1n truy c\u1eadp c\u1ee7a b\u00e1c s\u0129 \u0111\u1ed1i v\u1edbi h\u1ed3 s\u01a1 - \u0110\u1ea3m b\u1ea3o t\u00ednh ri\u00eang t\u01b0 v\u00e0 b\u1ea3o m\u1eadt c\u1ee7a th\u00f4ng tin y t\u1ebf","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/EHR_Certify.sol":"EHR_Certify"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/EHR_Certify.sol":{"keccak256":"0x8f4be6dfe11ef3bd49ba2399670bc1958cf56c327845283793bbcf3abd7f728e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://2413c460b885dd31c95d6e9e23385a23ba25796e7144a24a605f326033c6588e","dweb:/ipfs/QmTYDM9sPjLCnpMa8rxfJXbwG7SmTY9KYbECVytk4LcPCb"]}},"version":1}

devdoc.title: EHR_Certify - Hp ng chng thc

EmergencyAccess(bytes32,address,uint256).notice: S kin ny gip: - Ghi li mi ln truy cp khn cp - Thng bo cho ch s hu h s - To du vt kim ton cho mc ch theo di

emergencyAccess(bytes32).notice: Chc nng ny c s dng trong cc trng hp: - Cp cu y t khn cp - Bnh nhn bt tnh hoc khng th t cp quyn - Tnh hung nguy cp cn xem thng tin y t ngay lp tc - Bnh nhn cha kp cp quyn nhng cn c iu tr gp m bo tnh minh bch v trch nhim: - Ch bc s  c xc minh mi c th s dng - Mi ln truy cp khn cp u c ghi li - Ch s hu h s s c thng bo - Bc s phi chu trch nhim v vic s dng chc nng ny

isVerifiedDoctor(address).notice: Lu tr danh sch bc s  c xc minh v c php tham gia h thng

unverifyDoctor(address).notice: Ch qun tr vin (owner) mi c quyn hy xc minh bc s. Vic hy xc minh c th c thc hin trong cc trng hp: - Bc s vi phm quy nh ca h thng - Giy php hnh ngh ht hn hoc b thu hi - Bc s t nguyn ri khi h thng Sau khi b hy xc minh, bc s s: - Khng th s dng chc nng truy cp khn cp - Cc quyn truy cp hin c vn gi nguyn (cn c thu hi ring nu mun)

verifyDoctor(address).notice: Ch qun tr vin (owner) mi c quyn xc minh bc s.  Quy trnh xc minh bc s bao gm: 1. Kim tra giy php hnh ngh y 2. Xc minh danh tnh v chuyn mn 3. Cp quyn tham gia h thng Sau khi c xc minh, bc s c th: - c bnh nhn cp quyn xem h s - S dng chc nng truy cp khn cp khi cn

userdoc.notice: c s dng : - Lu tr bng chng v s tn ti ca h s trn blockchain - Qun l quyn truy cp ca bc s i vi h s - m bo tnh ring t v bo mt ca thng tin y t
